A non-precious metal alloy that is silver in color; it is a hard and durable metal.
A non-precious metal alloy that's "gold" in color; it is a hard and durable metal.
Combines silver and platinum for affordable beauty. This metal alloy is composed of 77% silver, 3% platinum, and 20% other metal alloy.
This radiant yellow 6K metal alloy is beautiful and affordable.
Over 40% pure gold... A practical choice for rings worn every day.
Over 40% pure gold... A practical choice for rings worn every day.
Over 60% pure gold... Provides a nice balance between gold content, durability and affordability.
Over 60% pure gold... Provides a nice balance between gold content, durability and affordability.
Over 75% pure gold... popular for higher-end jewelry.

A unique blend of the timeless beauty of silver and the enduring strength of platinum. Never bleached or dyed, platinum never tarnishes or discolors.
Your achievements are one-of-a-kind. Capture them in the metal color of your choice. Your memories are worth it! Silver Elite® and Lustrium® are registered trademarks of Jostens.
The antique finish provides contrast to accent all the details of your ring.
The natural satin finish looks great with any metal quality you choose!
Choose from satin or traditional antique finish. Our traditional antique finish uses black to heighten the details of your ring. Satin finish shows the entire ring in gold.
Enter your ring top personalization.

description.value: Enter the text you want on the inside of your ring EXACTLY (i.e., Steve R Smith). The engraving is case sensitive!
Enter the text you want on the inside of your ring (i.e., SRS). Engraving will be done in UPPERCASE!

longDescription.value: Enter the text you want it to appear on the inside of your ring (i.e., SRS). Engraving will be done in UPPERCASE!

The inside of your ring will be engraved with script lettering. If you choose Full Name, the engraving will be done exactly as you type it. If you choose Initials, the engraving will be done in UPPERCASE! Orders with inappropriate or offensive language will be refused.
